channel.title: mugics on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in mugics on Chaotic Online

item.title: Anthem of Stone
item.description: The earth split, toppling the towers, erasing the castle from memory Common Generic Item Value

item.title: Battlesong of Renewal
item.description: The search for the Cothica is also a search into yourself. You cannot find one without the other Common OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Canon of Casualty
item.description: Even before the first three notes finish playing, OverWorlders scramble for the nearest shelter Uncommon UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Chorus of Cothica
item.description: Some speak of the one true song, the Mugic that unites all Perim Ultra Rare Generic Item Value

item.title: Chorus of the Hive
item.description: What repels some attracts others. Is preference learned or ingrained? Common Danians Item Value

item.title: Decomposition
item.description: His strength faltered His bravery waned His feet dragged As we went insane Rare UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Decrescendo
item.description: Minimalism to the max Common Generic Item Value

item.title: Diminuendo
item.description: Aivenna dug deep, willing herself to keep fighting... but her body had nothing left to give Common Generic Item Value

item.title: Discord of Disarming
item.description: As his Windstrider decomposes into shrapnel, Bodal calculates that it will take 56.4 seconds before he splats on the ground Uncommon UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Dissonance of Distraction
item.description: Mugic can sink the spirit to immeasurable depths Common UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Dissonance of Will
item.description: Mugic, like memory, is fleeting Super Rare OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Draining Dirge
item.description: Though Mandiblors are treated as the dregs of society, Queen Illexia loves all her children equally Uncommon Danians Item Value

item.title: Ecstatic Fanfare
item.description: Najarin found it more interesting than prophetic that he had seven letters in his name Uncommon OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Fighters' Fanfare
item.description: The existence of Mugic is proof enough that nothing is impossible Ultra Rare Mipedians Item Value

item.title: Fluid Fugue
item.description: Seven notes... infinite possibilities Super Rare OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Fortissimo
item.description: Large is good. Larger is better. But really, really big is sometimes best Super Rare Generic Item Value

item.title: Geo Flourish
item.description: Protect the land and the land will protect you Uncommon Generic Item Value

item.title: Howl of the Wind
item.description: The tornado ripped across the fields, destroying the harvest, starving the land Common Generic Item Value

item.title: Intertwined Melody
item.description: I never thought an UnderWorlder would save my life. I owe you... unfortunately Gespedan Rare UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Melody of Malady
item.description: A little bit more for me, a little bit less for you. Perfect! Zalvar Super Rare UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Melody of Mirage
item.description: Trust your ears, not your eyes Rare Mipedians Item Value

item.title: Notes of Neverwhere
item.description: If you have all that you need, you are always home From an ancient Mugician text Common Mipedians Item Value

item.title: Refrain of Denial (OverWorld)
item.description: Cacophony signalled the beginning of the end of peace for the Mugicians Super Rare OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Requiem of Fear
item.description: There is no need to fight if your foe is in flight! Uncommon M'arrillians Item Value

item.title: Requiem of Lost Minds
item.description: A word to the wise: the wise need no words Uncommon M'arrillians Item Value

item.title: Searing Symphony
item.description: The rain not only nourishes but drowns. The embers warm as well as burn Rare UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Song of Deflection
item.description: Beauty is in the ears of the beholder. Even discordant notes sound harmonious in dire situations Ultra Rare Mipedians Item Value

item.title: Song of Embernova
item.description: Fire consumes air, suffocating the earth Rare Generic Item Value

item.title: Song of Fury
item.description: My legs or my Mugician? There is no choice... Cut them off! Miklon Rare UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Song of Futuresight
item.description: Take care when peering into the future. Sometimes it is best to not know what comes Common Generic Item Value

item.title: Song of Geonova
item.description: Forsake the land and the land will forsake you Rare Generic Item Value

item.title: Song of Obstruction
item.description: Unknown Generic Item Value

item.title: Song of Resurgence
item.description: Our understanding of Mugic is the direct inverse of our gratitude for its existence Najarin Uncommon OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Song of Reversal
item.description: Unknown Generic Item Value

item.title: Song of Revival
item.description: The Mugicians believed that anything that once was cannot be lost forever Ultra Rare UnderWorld Item Value

item.title: Song of Stasis
item.description: A melody has the power to move you... or not Rare OverWorld Item Value

item.title: Song of Translocation
item.description: There's no shame in losing a fight. There's only shame in losing your life Headmaster Ankhyja Rare Mipedians Item Value

item.title: Symphonic Shield
item.description: Unknown Mipedians Item Value

item.title: Tune Around
item.description: Unknown Unknown Item Value

item.title: Tune of Xerium
item.description: Uncommon __MISSING__ Item Value
